law.history: Repealed 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 19, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 9. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 43. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 216aa-48.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Feebleminded persons not to be kept in poorhouse.
metadata.lrc-note: . This section was amended by Acts 1978, ch. 92, Â§ 9. The later repeal by Acts 1978, ch. 118, Â§ 19 prevails.
